column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Not going to lie I was pretty excited to try this famed pizza spot
column2: however I left really disappointed. Honestly it tasted like pizza hut..the one inside the Target stores that are microwaved. No wonder why the crime is so high in this city. Truly overrated
column3: I would skip and go to pequods (which is way better in most ppls opinions)
